Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyRoom

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements Collidable, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Room class that represents a single room in the dungeon
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    srikrishna + kinjal(Collision Detection)
